Name: Ertugrul Gazi
About the game: Ertugrul Gazi is an immersive role-playing game consisting of 60 episodes, with features such as horse riding, swimming, rolling and fighting. This game is about the foundation of the Ottoman Empire and the Crusader and Mongolian struggles. This is Kayı's game! This is the epic of a nation's founding and resurrection! This is a true story of heroism! Witness the story of Ertugrul Gazi, a great statesman, leader and warrior! A story of epic valor inspired by real people and events... With high resolution 3D graphics and user-friendly interface, Ertugrul Gazi is a pioneer in the establishment of the Ottoman Empire, which ruled 3 continents, and witness the resurrection and foundation of a nation! Ertugrul Ghazi, the illustrious Governor of Kayı, fight and rule for a state with Ertugrul Gazi! A struggle for justice and truth that comes before us from the dusty shelves of history!
Meta Title: Ertugrul Gazi: Dec 28, 2020, UMURO and Full Overview
